name: HidayahCloud AI Bot
title: HidayahCloud AI Bot – Interactive Quran Guidance & AI Responses
overview: HidayahCloud AI Bot is a state-of-the-art AI chatbot providing intelligent Quran guidance. It integrates complete Quranic text, translations (Urdu & English), Sudais recitation audio, and AI embeddings + RAG for context-aware responses via FastAPI backend and interactive Discord/WhatsApp frontends.

accordion.title: Project Overview
accordion.content: HidayahCloud AI Bot delivers authentic Quranic guidance with AI-powered, context-aware responses. It uses FastAPI backend and interactive Discord/WhatsApp frontends for seamless engagement.

accordion.title: AI Pipeline & Architecture
accordion.content: Dataset → Scraping → Text Chunking → Embeddings → RAG → LLM → FastAPI → Discord/WhatsApp Frontend. This ensures vectorized, context-aware AI responses.

accordion.title: Technical Challenges & Solution
accordion.content: Maintaining theological and contextual accuracy was critical. Solved by semantic embeddings, RAG retrieval, and strict grounding of LLM responses in verified Quranic content.

features: Interactive Discord and WhatsApp bot frontends

name: Daee Al-Quran AI
title: Daee Al-Quran AI – Interactive Quranic Guidance Platform
overview: Daee Al-Quran AI is an advanced AI-powered platform delivering authentic Quranic guidance based on the lectures, translations, and notes of Dr. Israr Ahmed. It leverages Large Language Models (LLMs), Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), and semantic embeddings to provide accurate, contextual, and real-time responses through a secure, cross-platform Flutter application.

accordion.title: Project Overview
accordion.content: Daee Al-Quran AI is a research-driven AI platform that transforms Dr. Israr Ahmed’s lectures into an intelligent conversational assistant. The system ensures authenticity by grounding responses strictly within verified lecture content using RAG-based retrieval.

accordion.title: AI Pipeline & Architecture
accordion.content: Dataset → Scraping → Text Chunking → Embeddings → Vector Search → RAG → LLM → FastAPI → Flutter Frontend → Firebase Chat → Firestore Database → Role-Based Authentication.

accordion.title: Technical Challenges & Solution
accordion.content: The primary challenge was maintaining theological accuracy while using generative AI. This was solved through semantic embeddings, controlled retrieval, and strict grounding of LLM responses in authenticated source material.

features: Interactive AI chat based on Dr. Israr Ahmed’s lectures
Modular and scalable AI backend architecture

name: Professional Data Science Projects
title: Professional Data Science & Machine Learning Project Collection
overview: A curated collection of five end-to-end data science and machine learning projects demonstrating real-world problem solving, statistical analysis, predictive modeling, and data pipeline engineering. These projects are inspired by the Sir Zeeshan Usmani Sahab SkilledScore internship program and collaboration with Ghuftugu Publishers, focusing on churn prediction, sentiment analysis, sales forecasting, fraud detection, and full-stack data analytics pipelines.

accordion.title: Project Scope
accordion.content: The collection includes five applied projects: Telecom Customer Churn Prediction, Amazon Product Review Sentiment Analysis, Sales Forecasting using Time Series models, Fraud Detection in Financial Transactions, and an End-to-End Data Pipeline for Movie Analytics.

accordion.title: Learning & Academic Value
accordion.content: Each project emphasizes data preprocessing, feature engineering, model selection, evaluation metrics, and insight-driven visualization. These projects were inspired by and aligned with Sir Zeeshan Usmani Sahab's SkilledScore internship program and Ghuftugu Publishers, making the collection suitable for academic instruction, NAVTTC-style training, and applied industry learning.

accordion.title: Technical Depth
accordion.content: Projects demonstrate classical and advanced ML techniques including Logistic Regression, Random Forest, Naive Bayes, XGBoost, ARIMA, Prophet, LSTM, handling imbalanced datasets with SMOTE, and building SQL-backed analytical pipelines with dashboards.

features: Sentiment analysis on large-scale text data
Time series forecasting with ARIMA, Prophet, and LSTM
Aligned with Sir Zeeshan Usmani Sahab SkilledScore internship program and Ghuftugu Publishers collaboration

name: E-commerce
title: E-commerce Website – Junaid Jamshed Inspired Web Clone
overview: A static e-commerce website developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap, inspired by the Junaid Jamshed brand. The project showcases stitched, unstitched, fragrances, and kids garments sections. This was my first complete web project, developed during my early learning phase at Eureka, focusing on layout structuring, UI consistency, and responsive design fundamentals.
client: Academic Project (Eureka – First Web Development Project)

accordion.title: Project Background
accordion.content: This project was developed as my first hands-on web development assignment at Eureka. The goal was to understand real-world website structure by cloning a well-known Pakistani fashion brand.

accordion.title: Functional Sections
accordion.content: The website includes stitched and unstitched garments, fragrances, and kids wear sections, each designed as individual UI fragments for better layout organization.

accordion.title: Learning Outcomes
accordion.content: Strengthened fundamentals of HTML structure, CSS styling, Bootstrap grids, basic JavaScript interactions, and responsive web design concepts.

name: أصوات القرآن – Quran Voices
title: أصوات القرآن – Quran Voices
overview: Quran Voices is a lightweight and elegant Kivy-based mobile application that enables verse-level Quran audio playback. Users can select their preferred reciter, browse Surahs, and listen to individual Ayahs with accurate Arabic text rendering, providing a smooth and spiritually engaging listening experience.

accordion.title: Project Overview
accordion.content: Quran Voices is a mobile-focused Quran listening application built with Kivy. It allows users to select a reciter, browse Surahs, and play verse-level audio while ensuring accurate Arabic text rendering for a clean and distraction-free experience.

accordion.title: App Flow & Architecture
accordion.content: Splash Screen → Reciter Selection → Surah List → Verse-Level Audio Screen → Threaded Audio Playback. The architecture focuses on simplicity, responsiveness, and smooth user interaction on mobile devices.

accordion.title: Technical Challenges & Solutions
accordion.content: The main challenge was displaying Arabic text correctly and managing audio playback without freezing the UI. This was solved using arabic_reshaper with bidi support and running audio playback in a separate thread.

name: Hidayah Cloud
title: Hidayah Cloud – Authentic Islamic Knowledge & AI-Powered Qur’an Guidance
overview: Hidayah Cloud is a faith-centered digital platform designed to deliver authentic Islamic knowledge through modern technology. It integrates Qur’an, Hadith, and AI-powered guidance to help seekers access verified Islamic content anytime, anywhere, while maintaining spiritual integrity, scholarly grounding, and a clean user experience.

accordion.title: Platform Vision
accordion.content: Hidayah Cloud aims to bridge Islam and modern technology by making authentic Qur’anic and Sunnah-based knowledge accessible through carefully designed digital experiences rooted in sincerity and trust.

accordion.title: Core Offerings
accordion.content: The platform hosts multiple Islamic applications including Quran & Hadith explorers, audio Qur’an experiences, React-based Mushaf tools, and AI-assisted guidance systems designed for learning, reflection, and spiritual growth.

accordion.title: AI & Automation Integration
accordion.content: Hidayah Cloud extends into AI-powered bots for Discord and WhatsApp, providing context-aware Qur’anic guidance, authentic Urdu and English translations, Sudais recitations, semantic ayah search, and FastAPI-driven backend services.

name: Mushaf Cloud
title: Mushaf Cloud – Multilingual Quran App with Tafsir & High-Quality Audio
overview: Mushaf Cloud is a comprehensive Quran application providing access to the Holy Quran with translations and tafsirs in 40 languages, combined with high-quality audio recitations from renowned Qaris. The app supports offline audio downloads, Ayah sharing, customizable fonts, and a clean, responsive user interface designed for deep reflection and ease of use.

accordion.title: Application Overview
accordion.content: Mushaf Cloud offers a complete Quran reading and listening experience, featuring the Arabic Quran alongside 134 translations and tafsirs in 40 languages, with intuitive navigation and a distraction-free interface.

accordion.title: Audio & Offline Capabilities
accordion.content: The app integrates 20 renowned reciters with high-quality audio playback. Users can stream or download Ayah audio for offline use using Just Audio, Dio, and Path Provider, ensuring uninterrupted access to recitation anytime.

accordion.title: Sharing & Customization
accordion.content: Users can share Ayah text or downloaded audio directly via social platforms. The app also supports customizable typography using Google Fonts, enhancing readability and personalization.

name: Islamic Vision
title: Islamic Vision – Quran & Hadith Explorer
overview: Islamic Vision is a cross-platform Flutter application designed to provide authentic access to the Qur’an and Hadith. Developed under academic supervision at Sheikh Zayed Islamic Center, University of Karachi, the app offers multilingual Quran translations, tafsir, high-quality recitations, and a comprehensive Hadith module with advanced search and sharing features.
client: Sheikh Zayed Islamic Center, University of Karachi

accordion.title: Quran Module
accordion.content: Provides 134 translations and tafsirs in over 40 languages, 20 high-quality reciters, offline audio downloads, ayah search with highlights, sharing features, and customizable fonts using Google Fonts.

accordion.title: Hadith Module
accordion.content: Includes search by Hadith number, Arabic text, Urdu, and English across nine authentic Hadith collections including Bukhari, Muslim, Tirmidhi, Abu Dawood, Ibn Majah, Nasa’i, Mishkat, Musnad Ahmad, and Al-Silsilah al-Sahihah.

accordion.title: Academic & Technical Highlights
accordion.content: Developed as an academic project with a clean, responsive UI, multilingual support (Arabic, Urdu, English), Urdu keyboard for Quranic search, and optimized performance through API-based architecture.

name: القرآن الكريم بصوت العفاسي (Al-Quran Al-Kareem Bi Sawt Al-Afasy)
title: Al-Quran Al-Kareem – Full Quran Audio Player
overview: Complete Quran audio player featuring Mishary Rashid Alafasy recitation, built in Flutter.

name: Sunnah Vision – Hadith App
title: Hadith App – Comprehensive Hadith Collection
overview: A fully searchable and categorized Hadith application built with Flutter, featuring Arabic, Urdu, and English text across major authentic collections.

accordion.title: Hadith Module
accordion.content: Includes search by Hadith number, Arabic text, Urdu, and English across nine authentic Hadith collections including Bukhari, Muslim, Tirmidhi, Abu Dawood, Ibn Majah, Nasa’i, Mishkat, Musnad Ahmad, and Al-Silsilah al-Sahihah.

name: Course API
title: Course API – Academic Course Management Backend
overview: Java & Android-based REST API for managing courses, students, and academic progress. Integrated with Firebase for real-time data storage, student tracking, and cloud authentication. GitHub repositories used for version control and collaboration.

name: Google Maps Integration
title: Google Maps Integration – Flutter Mapping Module
overview: Custom Google Maps integration in Flutter with markers, interactions, and map controls for mobile applications.

accordion.title: Integration Overview
accordion.content: Implemented interactive Google Maps features in Flutter including marker placement, custom info windows, zoom controls, and map gestures for mobile apps.

name: Foodie App
title: Foodie App – Full-Stack Food Delivery Mobile App
overview: A full-featured food delivery mobile application built with Java and Firebase, enabling users to browse restaurants, discover dishes, place orders, and share reviews, inspired by apps like Food Panda. Developed as an FYP under the NAVTTC program at IBA University.

accordion.title: System Overview
accordion.content: Foodie App allows users to browse restaurants, view menus, place orders, track delivery status, and leave reviews. The backend is powered by Firebase Realtime Database and Cloud Firestore, ensuring real-time updates and secure data management.

accordion.title: Academic & Industry Value
accordion.content: This project demonstrates practical mobile development, full-stack integration, and real-world application workflows. It serves as a capstone project for the NAVTTC program and provides a strong portfolio piece for career opportunities in Android app development.

name: LaravelQuranAPI
title: LaravelQuranAPI – RESTful Quran Data Service
overview: A developer-friendly RESTful API delivering comprehensive Quranic text, translations, tafsirs, and audio from top reciters. Supports multi-language translations and offers a robust backend for Islamic apps and educational projects.

accordion.title: Key Features
accordion.content: Top 20 Quran Reciters, 134 Quran Translations & Tafsirs in 40 languages, optimized for easy integration in web and mobile apps.

accordion.title: Languages Supported
accordion.content: Arabic (20), English (19), Persian (14), Russian (10), Turkish (10), Urdu (9), German (4), Spanish (4), Dutch (3), Indonesian (3), Albanian (3), Bengali (2), Azerbaijani (2), Czech (2), Malayalam (2), French (2), Hindi (2), Italian (1), Japanese (1), Korean (1), Kurdish (1), Norwegian (1), Polish (1), Pashto (1), Portuguese (1), Romanian (1), Sindhi (1), Somali (1), Swahili (1), Swedish (1), Tamil (1), Tajik (1), Thai (1), Tatar (1), Uyghur (1), Uzbek (1), Amharic (1), Berber (1), Dhivehi (1).

accordion.title: Academic & Industry Value
accordion.content: Demonstrates building a scalable API with Laravel, RESTful design principles, and real-world applicability for Islamic educational tools and apps.

name: Hadith Nabawi API
title: Hadith Nabawi ﷺ API – RESTful Hadith Data Service
overview: A RESTful API delivering authenticated Hadith collections from 9 major books with full search capabilities. Designed for developers and educational platforms to integrate Hadith content easily into apps or websites.

accordion.title: Key Features
accordion.content: Provides REST endpoints for 9 authentic Hadith books with full-text search, filtering by book, chapter, or narration number, enabling easy integration in web and mobile applications.

accordion.title: Hadith Collections Included
accordion.content: Sahih al-Bukhari, Sahih Muslim, Jami` at-Tirmidhi, Sunan Abu Dawood, Sunan Ibn Majah, Sunan an-Nasa'i, Mishkat al-Masabih, Musnad Ahmad, Al-Silsilah al-Sahihah

accordion.title: Project Demo
accordion.content: Watch demo: <iframe width='560' height='315' src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/2Tr39LBCoQA' title='Hadith Nabawi API Demo' frameborder='0' allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: Library Management System
title: Library Management System – Desktop App
overview: Java-based system for managing books and students.

name: Restaurant Management System
title: Restaurant Management System – POS Desktop App
overview: POS and inventory system for restaurants.
